properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 7 at 6:31PM CST until January 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River at Demopolis
Lock and Dam...

Elevated water levels continue along portions of the Tombigbee River due to recent heavy rainfall. The river has crested and levels have begun a slow fall. The latest forecast calls for the Tombigbee River at Demopolis to fall below flood stage on Saturday. Additional rainfall is forecast Friday and Saturday, though current projected totals don't bring the river back into flood stage.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until Saturday afternoon...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  6:15 PM Tuesday the stage was 76.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 68.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
early Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 77.0 feet...Flooding of numerous cabins and trailers
near the river can be expected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning, or sooner if
conditions warrant.
